Day of the Dead Mask Green (female)
kDesc
This colorful mask was inspired by the masks they wear in Mexico during Dia de los Muertos (Day of the Dead)! [#Legal]
Ce masque coloré est inspiré des masques portés au Mexique lors du Día de los Muertos (Fête des Morts). [#Legal]
Diese farbenfrohe Maske wurde von den Masken inspiriert, die in Mexiko am Dia de los Muertos (Tag der Toten) getragen werden! [#Legal]
Questa maschera coloratissima trae ispirazione da quelle che vengono indossate in Messico nel día de los muertos (il giorno dei morti)! [#Legal]
¡Esta vistosa máscara está inspirada en las que se llevan en México durante el Día de Muertos! [#Legal]
このカラフルな仮面はハロウィンのお祭り騒ぎにぴったりな装いです！[#Legal]
이 화려한 마스크는 "Dia de los Muertos", 또는 "죽은 자의 날"에 멕시코에서 착용하는 마스크에서 영감을 얻었습니다. [#Legal]
This colorful mask was inspired by the masks they wear in Mexico during Dia de los Muertos (Day of the Dead)! [#Legal]
這個色彩繽紛的面具是參考墨西哥「Dia de los Muertos (死者之日)」所戴的面具而設計！ [#Legal]
這個色彩繽紛的面具是參考墨西哥「Dia de los Muertos (死者之日)」所戴的面具而設計！ [#Legal]
This colorful mask was inspired by the masks they wear in Mexico during Dia de los Muertos (Day of the Dead)! [#Legal]
